beforeChange(CamelCaseInterceptor.MutableContext) - Method in interface org.netbeans.spi.editor.typinghooks.CamelCaseInterceptor

This method is called before any text is inserted into a document.

This method is called before any text is inserted into a document.
beforeRemove(DeletedTextInterceptor.Context) - Method in interface org.netbeans.spi.editor.typinghooks.DeletedTextInterceptor
This method is called before any text is removed from a document.
